description: A vegan ice cream recipe that delivers! This dairy-free carrot cake ice cream tastes like a slice of carrot cake and is luxuriously creamy thanks to cashew nuts in the ice cream base. Way healthier and lower in calories than cake, too!Â  Allergy Information: Free of Dairy, egg, corn, soy, yeast, gluten.
keywords: carrot cake ice cream, vegan cashew ice cream, vegan ice cream recipe
name: Vegan Carrot Cake Ice Cream Recipe
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cups broken walnuts or pecans or other nuts
1 Tablespoon ground raw sugar or other fine vegan sugar
1 can coconut milk (13.5 oz, a little less than 2 cups)
1/3 cup ground raw sugar (1/2 cup for sweeter)

recipeInstructions.text: Add oil to pan on medium heat. Add chopped walnuts and roast for 1-2 minutes. Stir frequently. Add the sugar, salt and spices and mix well. Continue to cook till the sugar caramelizes and sticks to the walnuts.
